scripts.build: npm run build -w @optivem/commons-util && npm run build -w @optivem/commons-testing-dsl && npm run build -w @optivem/commons-land && npm run build -w @optivem/commons-http && npm run build -w @optivem/commons-playwright && npm run build -w @optivem/commons-testing-assertions
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test -w system-test
